author: Lokesh
text:
Don't leave it just because it's tough learn to fight tough battles, because while fighting tough battles it gives you confidence in your life. 

- Inspired Me to Inspire You 

#InspirationalQuotes

author: Lokesh
text: Never be Too Much Isolated or socialise too much,actually there is a line of control and everything is fine until u don't breach it.

author: Lokesh
text: Stand for yourself in need , because nobody else is going to for you.

author: Lokesh
text: Don't stop in the path in which you are walking the destination might be near you at any point of time . Always Keep Going kicking away all the obstacles.

author: Lokesh
text: You will rise , you will fall but all you need is only Consistency.
